dataObjects.title: Ancistrus hoplogenys
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: "Ancistrus hoplogenys." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. 22 Aug 2014, 02:40 UTC. 12 Jan 2015 <http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Ancistrus_hoplogenys&oldid=641273925>.
dataObjects.description:
Ancistrus hoplogenys is a species of armored catfish native to Argentina, Brazil, Guyana, Paraguay, Peru, Suriname and Uruguay. This species grows to a length of 15.8 centimetres (6.2 in) SL. In the aquarium hobby this fish is also known as L059

References[edit]

  • Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2011). "Ancistrus hoplogenys" in FishBase. December 2011 version.
